title: Hello! I'm having a problem with the "Styles & Wallpapers" app.
content:
I  created my own style, but I didn't like it. I decided to delete it and then create a new one, but the app throws me back. Please help me to solve this problem. 

P.s.  I apologize for my bad  English (this is not my native language).
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
